root.name: Bad Mojo Redux
root.description: Re-release Bad Mojo Redux is a remastered version of Bad Mojo released by Got Game Entertainment in 2004.The major difference is that the color depth and video resolution was increased for all of the Full Motion Video sequences.The videos in the original Bad Mojo are 256 colors where as the videos in Redux are 24-bit Truecolor (17 million colors).The US retail version of Bad Mojo Redux also came with a bonus DVD detailing the making of Bad Mojo. StoryYou take on the role of a corrupt scientist who is mysteriously transformed into a cockroach moments before you make your great escape. From there you navigate the filthy apartment, all the while taking care to stay alive. As you make your way through the labyrinthine environments, you start to piece together the missing parts of your cloudy past. The ending will vary depending on your final actions.ControlsCharacter control is solely based on the 4 directional arrow keys.
